study_design.primary_endpoint: Agreement between AI triage recommendation and expert clinical assessment
secondary_endpoints: Time to treatment for high-acuity patients

sample_size.power_calculation: 80% power to detect 5% difference in triage accuracy

inclusion_criteria: Patients ≥ 1 year of age presenting to emergency department
Complete vital signs and clinical assessment available
exclusion_criteria: Patients who opt out of AI-assisted triage

site_requirements: Level I or II trauma center

outcome_data: Length of stay and time to treatment

statistical_analysis.primary_analysis: Cohen's kappa for agreement between AI and clinical triage
secondary_analyses: Sensitivity and specificity for high-acuity cases
Subgroup analyses by age, gender, and presenting complaint
statistical_analysis.safety_analysis: Descriptive analysis of missed diagnoses and adverse events
